ModMetaData.name: Animal Armor: Vanilla
ModMetaData.author: Oh God Spiders No
ModMetaData.description:
<color=yellow>INCOMPATIBILITY NOTE:</color> Good news! There is only one mod that this is incompatible with: <color=orange>Animal Variety Coats</color>
It's a soft incompatibility. It will play fine but cougar armor will look off center due to a small error on their end. A patch has been created, but they have not put the updated version on steam yet.
